org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.wm

Interface Trigger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExecutionTrigger

    public interface Trigger
    Trigger interface which gets mapped to CREATE TRIGGER .. queries. A trigger can have a name, expression and action. Trigger is a simple expression which gets evaluated during the lifecycle of query and executes an action if the expression defined in trigger evaluates to true.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean apply(long current)
      Based on current value, returns true if trigger is applied else false.
      Trigger clone()
      Return cloned copy of this trigger
      Action getAction()
      Return the action that will get executed when trigger expression evaluates to true
      Expression getExpression()
      Get trigger expression
      String getName()
      Return the name of the trigger
      String getViolationMsg()
      Get error message set during trigger violation.
      void setViolationMsg(String violationMsg)
      Set trigger violation message.

      • setViolationMsg

        void setViolationMsg(String violationMsg)
        Set trigger violation message. When apply(long) returns false, this can be used to set message for trigger violation which will be sent as response to clients.
        Parameters:
        violationMsg - violation message

      • getViolationMsg
